argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgmre.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_subrgss | |- ( a e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> a C_ B ) |
| 3 |  | #P_selpw | |- ( a e. ~P B <-> a C_ B ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylibr | |- ( a e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> a e. ~P B ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( a e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> a e. ~P B ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ssrdv | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` R ) C_ ~P B ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_subrgid | |- ( R e. Ring -> B e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_subrgint | |- ( ( a C_ ( SubRing ` R ) /\ a =/= (/) ) -> |^| a e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ a C_ ( SubRing ` R ) /\ a =/= (/) ) -> |^| a e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 7, 9 | #P_ismred | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` R ) e. ( Moore ` B ) ) |
